content: Thanks for taking the question. Thanks for taking the question. Thanks for taking the question. We hear very consistently from customers that our approach to simplicity and ease of use is one of the reasons why â you see the results that youâre seeing today and the Net Promoter Score that Frank mentioned, because we help customers focus on solving data problems, getting value out of the data and not deal with the infrastructure.
